description: This file is a Java source file defining a REST controller for managing event attendance, including registration, deregistration, listing attendees, and counting attendance for events.

classes.name: AttendanceController
classes.description: REST controller for managing attendees related to events, providing endpoints for registration, deregistration, listing, and counting attendees.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Handles HTTP POST requests to register a new attendee to an event.

methods.name: unregister
methods.description: Handles HTTP DELETE requests to remove an attendee from an event.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles HTTP GET requests to list all attendees for a specific event.

methods.name: count
methods.description: Handles HTTP GET requests to retrieve the current attendee count for an event.
